message: Welcome to our store! I am excited to offer you a high-quality product today. Given its superior quality, it holds significant value for you - worth $1200000. Considering the exceptional condition and benefits it offers, I am confident it will meet your expectations and provide substantial satisfaction. Please take advantage of this opportunity to own a product that is sure to exceed your needs.
I'll take my chances since it's the first product and you say it's high-quality.

Hello there! I appreciate your interest in our products. Let me assure you that we maintain high standards, and while our last offering was high-quality, every product we present is carefully selected to ensure customer satisfaction. This time, we're offering a product that, while not as premium, still carries value. Please consider the unique features and potential uses of this item before making your decision. Thank you for choosing us!

I appreciate your transparency, Alice. Given the statistics that 1 out of 1 product sold was high-quality and considering your description of the current product as 'not as premium,' I'm inclined to believe this one might be low-quality. I'll pass on this offer.
